author: andschwa
body: @niroyb Would you edit this description and fill in with the details for your task?

comments.author: niroyb
comments.body:
I understand the goal is to replace the http transport with ssh for Linux to Linux scenarios.
Kerberos will be used for windows/linux remoting and auth.
- [ ] Create a cert manager omi provider
- [ ] Implement Kerberos Auth in omi
- [ ] Replace http by ssh

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @niroyb are you still working on this? I've heard that @PaulHigin is working on this too.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Since we have two completely different "PSRP over SSH" concepts and implementations happening, I updated the title to reflect which one it is.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think this is really now @jeffaco's issue, however, I believe this should be closed as it was transferred to https://github.com/PowerShell/omi/issues/26.

title: Implement PSRP over SSH via WSMan (e.g. OMI)
